news_header: EU medical equipment suppliers face unfair access to Chinese public procurement.
news_text: The European Commission has found evidence that EU medical equipment suppliers do not have fair access to Chinese public procurement. This could lead to restrictions on Chinese suppliers in Europe. The Commission plans to assess measures to prevent discrimination against medical devices in the EU. In April 2024, it launched its first study under the International Procurement Instrument (IPI) to ensure reciprocity in access to public procurement.
